alert.note: Alert for Northern Berkshire; Southern Berkshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 28 at 3:22AM EST until January 30 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph and lead to blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Windham County in Vermont and Berkshire County in Massachusetts. * WHEN...From late tonight through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The best chance for the higher snowfall accumulations will be across southeastern parts of each county.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
